description: Non-material amendment to planning permission dated 07/11/2023 ref 2023/2315 (Demolition of existing garages and erection of part single/part three-storey building to provide 2 x studio flats and communal living area to be used for specialist/supported housing (sui generis). Alterations including erection of replacement boundary treatment and cycle/waste stores to front garden and works to trees) to allow internal alterations to layout, adjustment to rooflight provision, change to boundary treatment, relocation of heat pumps, increasing ground floor area, omission of brickwork features, alterations to window design and north elevation upper floor windows to be openable and not obscured.
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The changes are not minor, and would constitute a material alteration to the approved scheme.

Reason : 2 - INFORMATIVE: Please note that the discharge of Condition 6, for the provision of bird and bat boxes, requires a separate application for an 'approval of details reserved by a condition', and it is not possible to discharge the requrements of the condition through an application for a non-material amendment.

Condition 13 of planning permission 2023/2315 that requires certain windows to be obscured glazed and fixed shut can only be removed through a s.73 (variation or removal of condition) planning application.
